recipe.ingredients: - quinoa: 1 cup - water: 2 cups - cherry tomatoes (halved): 1 cup - cucumber (diced): 1 medium - red onion (thinly sliced): 1 small - carrots (shredded): 1/2 cup - spinach leaves: 2 cups - lemon juice: 3 tablespoons - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - garlic powder: 1/2 teaspoon - dried oregano: 1/2 teaspoon - pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Cook Quinoa: Rinse quinoa thoroughly under cold water. In a saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to a boil. Add quinoa, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is cooked and water is absorbed, about 15 minutes. Then fluff with a fork and set aside to cool. 2. Prepare Veggies: In a large bowl, combine cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, carrots, and spinach. Toss these vegetables gently. 3. Make Dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, garlic powder, dried oregano, and pepper. 4. Combine and Serve: Mix the cooled quinoa with the vegetables. Drizzle the dressing over the top and toss everything together until well-mixed. Serve immediately, or chill before serving.
